/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Trees line the sides of the road, their green leaves adding a touch of nature to the scene. Buildings of various sizes and designs fill the background, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene and enhancing the vibrancy of the colors.
